Class ProjectController

Object
ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
Controller handling business logic related to BTO Projects.

  • Constructor Details

      public ProjectController()

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(String name, String neighbourhood, Map<FlatType,Integer> initialFlatUnitCounts, Map<FlatType,Double> flatUnitPrices, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, HdbManager creatingManager)
      Creates a new BTO project listing. Only HDB Managers can perform this action.
      Parameters:
      name - Project Name.
      neighbourhood - Project Neighbourhood.
      initialFlatUnitCounts - Map of initial unit counts per flat type.
      flatUnitPrices - Map of unit prices per flat type.
      applicationOpenDate - Application open date.
      applicationCloseDate - Application close date.
      creatingManager - The HDB Manager creating the project.
      Returns:
      The created Project object, or null if creation failed (e.g., validation error, manager busy).

    • editProject

      public boolean editProject(HdbManager editor, String projectName, String newNeighbourhood, Map<FlatType,Integer> newUnitCounts, Map<FlatType,Double> newUnitPrices, Date newOpenDate, Date newCloseDate)
      Edits details of an existing project. Only the HDB Manager in charge should perform this (or potentially other managers?). Restrictions may apply (e.g., cannot edit certain fields after applications open).
      Parameters:
      editor - The HDB Manager attempting the edit.
      projectName - The name of the project to edit.
      newNeighbourhood - Optional new neighbourhood.
      newUnitCounts - Optional new unit counts map.
      newUnitPrices - Optional new unit prices map.
      newOpenDate - Optional new open date.
      newCloseDate - Optional new close date.
      Returns:
      true if editing was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(HdbManager deleter, String projectName)
      Deletes a project. Only the HDB Manager in charge should perform this (or any manager?). Restrictions: Cannot delete if applications exist? Or registrations? Needs clarification.
      Parameters:
      deleter - The HDB Manager attempting deletion.
      projectName - The name of the project to delete.
      Returns:
      true if deletion successful, false otherwise.

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public boolean toggleProjectVisibility(HdbManager manager, String projectName, boolean isVisible)
      Toggles the visibility of a project for applicants.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB Manager performing the action.
      projectName - The name of the project.
      isVisible - The desired visibility state (true for visible, false for hidden).
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise.

    • getProjectsByManager

      public List<Project> getProjectsByManager(HdbManager manager)
      Retrieves only the projects created by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB Manager.
      Returns:
      List of projects created by the manager.
